tool_description: Parses raw resume text and extracts structured content sections including contact information, experience, education, skills, and other relevant sections.

resume_text.description: The raw text content of the resume to be parsed

parsing_mode.description: Parsing strictness level: strict, moderate, or flexible

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide non-empty resume content for parsing.
Invalid parsing mode: Use one of [strict, moderate, flexible].
Insufficient content: Resume must contain at least contact information and one main section.
usage: Provide the raw resume text and optionally specify parsing mode. The tool will identify and extract different resume sections with their content.

sections.description: Identified resume sections with their content

section_types.description: Types of sections found (experience, education, skills, etc.)

parsing_confidence.description: Confidence score for the parsing accuracy (0-1)
